add.school.name: Enter name of school
admin.dashboard.title: Admin dashboard
admin.roles.tooltip:
There are two roles users of I-Talent that can be assigned that dictate what privileges they have within the app.



View Only: Users with the View Only role have the ability to review employee profiles (even if information is hidden or private) in order to support HR related work and troubleshoot users technical issues.



Admin: Users with the Admin role have all privileges users with View Only have but are also responsible for managing the access to the IdM user administration console as well as assigning and removing users to I-Talent roles. They are also able to change user profile statuses between active or inactive, delete user profiles, monitor user data and usage, and update lists of skills, skill categories, schools, and diplomas.
